instruction: Suggest ways to market a new product on a limited budget.
output: Marketing a new product on a limited budget can be achieved through various tactics. One option is to leverage social media by creating a presence on main platforms such as Instagram, Facebook and Twitter. You can then create campaigns and use targeted ads to reach specific audiences. Additionally, you can use email marketing to send promotional materials to pre-existing customers. You can also reach out to relevant influencers and offer them your product in exchange for an online review or post.
